sermons.title: Don't Forget To Remember
sermons.preacher_description:
William Carrol ( - )
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker William Carrol in mp3 format. Pastor William Carrol is an associate pastor and longtime “spiritual son” of the Times Square Church family. Shortly after his salvation, Pastor David Wilkerson, recognized the strong call of God on his life and sent him to Bible college and seminary for ministerial training.
While completing his studies, Pastor William served as a co-pastor and later as senior pastor of Denver Fellowship in Colorado. He holds a masters degree in philosophy of religion. In 2005, Pastor William was invited to “come home” and serve on the pastoral staff of Times Square Church.

sermons.title: Things To Forget And Things To Remember
sermons.preacher_description:
Zac Poonen ( - Present)
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker Zac Poonen in mp3 format. God called brother Zac Poonen to a new work early on in his Christian experience. The movement is now called Christian Fellowship Churches where the New Covenant of New Testament Christianity is clearly preached. 

Brother Zac Poonen has written 25 books most of them being on the deeper Christian life. Many of these have been translated into a number of languages and have been circulated widely around the world. He clearly and passionately shares the  narrow way of Christian discipleship that is neglected by so many modern preachers.
